title: Notebook: Pogačar Now One of Cycling’s Greats, Rating this Giro d’Italia, and Was it Boring?
content:
Tour de Hoody: There is nothing humdrum about Pogačar's winning panache, even if this Giro's GC fight was essentially a done deal.

Read the full article at Notebook: Pogačar Now One of Cycling’s Greats, Rating this Giro d’Italia, and Was it Boring? on Velo.
author: ahood
